        Tags = CutPlant;SharpKnife;ButcherAnimal;Sharpenable;IgnoreZombieDensity;KillAnimal,

            Sharpness = 1.0,
            ResearchableRecipes = Forge_Crude_Blade;Forge_Small_Knife,
      }
